item.title: How to Check Configuration for Bind
item.description: You probably heard of the three steps on how to debug networking issues… It’s not DNS There’s no way it’s DNS It was DNS While this is not only funny, but also true, you can do your part to prevent such issues. When you change the configuration for BIND, you should make sure it is still working. check bind configuration $ named-checkconf /path/to/named.conf The path depends on your distribution. For Ubuntu 20.
